website_summaries.verdict: The Asus ZenBook 13 is a classy Core i5 ultraportable that's priced aggressively. Even a slightly cramped keyboard can't keep it from an earnest recommendation.
pros: Touchpad can double as a numeric keypad

customer_reviews.title: Great value premium feel laptop
customer_reviews.text: Premium feel, premium look at a good price. i5-8250u processor enables effort-less multi-tasking alongside 8gb RAM. Very quiet machine. Takes up a bit more space than a traditional laptop due to the tilt/slant feature. However, for typing maybe it helps? One downside is accessing the F-keys - need to hold fn then press the key. Another downside is initially had a few problems with crashes but now those seem to be removed.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is really nice. Perfect little ultrabook, very lightweight. The colour is beautiful. However, I didn't receive a manual with the laptop however I did find the information on ASUS' own website.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Yip

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with cracked screen, too fragile?
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in sealed box but opened it to discover cracked screen.
customer_reviews.author: tartanic

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Bought from Amazon Warehouse, sold as 'like new' (even came in original packaging). The computer looked great and started very quickly initially. Cortana guided me through the usual initial settings, but as soon as that part was over, Windows did not start and I instead got the WHEA uncorrectable error (see pictures), which is usually caused by some type of hardware failure. In addition the laptop started overheating right away. Sent back for a refund today (the same day I received it). Really disappointed (waiting for my refund now).
customer_reviews.author: Giacomo

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant aesthetically, failed in durability
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetically this laptop is supreme. Not sold on its durability though. I bought it as a present However, the mousepad started to behave funny within the first 3 months and other weird freezing happened. Just little red flags you dont want to see in a new laptop really.. QUICK UPDATE 13/10/2020 Over the last few months the laptop has now been blue screening constantly, it's not even use-able. I can't seem to get through to amazon to get product support for it. ASUS won't repair it either because its 'over warranty'. Disastrous
customer_reviews.author: Honesty

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Laptop.
customer_reviews.text: I personally wasn't expected too much from Asus, but I'm disappointed in a good way. The Zenbook feels premium in hands and I love it. Well done Asus.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Block

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: I love how lightweight the laptop is. It's very sleek looking. Easy to use. Fast. The raised position of the laptop makes typing more enjoyable. The speakers aren't very loud, but not a major problem. The battery lasts for a very long time and charges up really quickly. Overall would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: hannah

customer_reviews.title: One of the best laptops I have owned
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic keyboard and a machine that I now carry with me at all times
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very light, fast and with great design
customer_reviews.text: Very light, fast and with great design. No touch screen but it does say in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Mpharm

customer_reviews.title: Quick, light.
customer_reviews.text: Lovely machine, quick, light. Keyboard is nice in use. Good battery life. Port expander thing is versatile but a bit on the large side. Backlit keyboard didn't initially work but updates seemed to sort it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shame about the speakers
customer_reviews.text: The only downfall are the speakers. They are located on the bottom and are very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Karolina

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop but gets hot
customer_reviews.text: Its great value for money, well I got it for 629 brand new. Its fast and stylish and the screen quality is great. But it gets really hot often - while charging and while downloading programs. It also crashed once, but never happened again.
customer_reviews.author: Zain Shabeeb

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight
customer_reviews.text: It did meet all the expectations, lightweight and beautiful design but unfortunately i had to return it after few days because of keyboard problems and asked for a refund I really loved this laptop
customer_reviews.author: Said Yahya

customer_reviews.title: blue screen error, defective series
customer_reviews.text: contant blue screen errors , I got a malfunctioning laptop back from the ASUS service point 3 times already. Its been more than a month I could not use my laptop, now waiting for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Istvan

customer_reviews.title: This was dispatched without being checked if it functioned
customer_reviews.text: This item failed to work - it turns on then immediately crashes
customer_reviews.author: ian dunning

customer_reviews.title: Bought Second Hand - Charging Failure
customer_reviews.text: Bought the laptop second hand, no cosmetic damage was on the laptop as described in the seller description. When the laptop was plugged in to charge during use, it would crash every time with a blue screen. The laptop was reset and it still crashed. Returned for a refund as customer service couldn't fix the issue.
customer_reviews.author: CianM

product_meta.title: ASUS ZenBook S UX391UA-ET082T Full HD 13.3 Inch Metal Laptop (Intel i5-8250U, 256 GB SSD, 8 GB RAM, Built in HarmanKardon Speakers, Illuminated Keyboard)
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Burgundy| Style Name:Intel i5/Non-TouchSlim. Stunning. Supreme. ZenBook S is all these, yet so much more. Its elegant sophistication will touch your heart and enhance your prestige, wherever you use it. Its effortless portability, powerful performance and no-compromise connectivity let you get things done without fuss, without drama. And its stunningly innovative design — incorporating our unique ErgoLift hinge — not only sets you apart from the crowd, but lets you work in supreme comfort too. ZenBook S: it’s the laptop you deserve.

BOX CONTAINS


 * Laptop
 * Charger
 * User Manual
 * Carry Sleeve
 * Mini dock
feature_bullets: Crafted from premium aerospace-grade aluminium to create a unibody all metal finish that is less than 0.5 Inch thin and weighs only 1 kg
Latest Intel 8th Gen Core i5-8250U processor, cooled by copper-alloy heat pipe and liquid-crystal-polymer fan
Equipped with a huge 256 GB PCI-e SSD for super-fast performance, allowing you to work without compromise
Exclusive ergolift hinge automatically tilts the keyboard to the most comfortable typing position, the backlit keyboard also helps you to work in all environments
ZenBook S meets the ultra-demanding MIL-STD 810G military standard for reliability and durability, undergoing a punishing test regime that includes extended tests for operation in harsh environments

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars60 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK
